name: amasty/module-store-pickup-with-locator
description: Store Pickup with Locator by Amasty

suggest.amasty/module-store-pickup-with-locator-: To use the functionality of the module-store-pickup-with-locator to the max, please install the module-store-pickup-with-locator-msi to version 1.0.3 or above. You will experience all benefits provided by MSI including advanced functionality of Store Pickup Option feature.
